title: Strengthening Healthcare Competencies: Literature Analysis and Application of Nordic Journalism Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Journalism Practice Experience and Foundational Theoretical Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the composition status and characteristics of literature used in Nordic journalism education programs.
Learners can derive practical strategies applicable to instructional design through comparative analysis of professional and academic literature.
Learners can submit project outcomes for improving domestic journalism education based on literature analysis results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
